summary: The point of this mod is to add mementos which will mainly consist of enchanted unique weapons and armor to Named Enemies.
descriptionHtml:
The point of this mod is to add unique enchanted items to Named Enemies. So Far this mod adds only 3 items: The Chief's Crown, added to the Riekling Chief on Solsthiem, Bashnag's Boots, added to Bashnag in Southfringe Sanctum, and Malkus's Sword, added to Malkus at Forebears Hideout. Over the next few weeks, i will be adding more item to more people.

Bashnag's Boots are enchanted with 20% Fortify Conjuration and 30% Fortify Destruction.
The Chief's Crown is enchanted with Waterbreathing and 30% Fortify One-Handed.
Malkus's Sword is enchanted with Frost and Shock Damage.

Requirements:
Dragonborn DLC
Dawnguard DLC

Credits:
Riekling Crown and Sedethul Models courtesy of Ghosu
Warchief Boots Courtesy of Hothtrooper44 ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13366/?]Link[/url])
author: DrNation
